comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: There are actually two Joseph Wheelers buried here. Joseph Wheeler Sr. and Joseph Wheeler Jr. Senior is one of the few Confederates buried in Arlington. Lieutenant General of the Confederate Army, and later Major General of the United States Army. Joseph Wheeler @ Arlington, including close up pics of the monument: www.arlingtoncemetery.net/jwheeler.htm Major General Wheeler was buried on January 29, 1906, and here is the account from the NYT: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=990CE2DD1531E733A...
